SignUp.Password.Info.p_1: We sent a one time password to your email address at {email}.
SignUp.Password.Info.p_2: Please check your email (and the spam folder if necessary), enter the password and click on login button.
SignUp.Password.Info.SWarning: The OTP will expire in 15 minutes.
SignUp.Password.ResendForm.p_1: If you haven't received your email, click here to resend.
